content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I have your full name, please?
Thanks, Jake! Can you please provide your address so I can check our service availability in your area?
Uh, I'd rather not give out my exact address over text. Is there another way?
I understand your concern, Jake. However, I'll need a valid address to make sure we're able to assist you. Could you please share at least the street name or neighborhood?
No, sorry. I don't feel comfortable sharing that info. Can you just help me book by zip code?

I'm sorry, Jake, but our system requires a detailed address to confirm service. Since I can't get that information, I'm unable to proceed with scheduling an appointment. If you'd prefer, I can connect you with a human operator to discuss other options.
